meanings.definition: The quality or state of being blond.
meanings.sent1: Her blondness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His blondness was inherited from his mother.
meanings.sent3: The blondness of the puppy's fur was so striking.
meanings.sent4: The blondness of the wheat fields under the sun was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The blondness of the sand on the beach shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having blond hair.
meanings.sent1: The twins shared the same blondness in their hair.
meanings.sent2: She dyed her hair to match the blondness of her favorite celebrity.
meanings.sent3: The blondness of his hair made him look like a surfer.
meanings.sent4: Her blondness was like a halo in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The natural blondness of her hair was envied by many.

meanings.definition: The lightness or brightness of blond hair.
meanings.sent1: The blondness of her hair seemed to glow in the dark.
meanings.sent2: His hairdresser recommended a shampoo to enhance the blondness.
meanings.sent3: The blondness of the paint color made the room feel airy.
meanings.sent4: The blondness of the sunrise painted the sky in pastel hues.
meanings.sent5: The blondness of her hair was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
